refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the prelude_code_t code contained within the prelude_error_t integer.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the prelude_source_t source contained within the prelude_error_t integer.

refsect2.title: prelude_perror ()
refsect2.para: Print the error to stderr, or to syslog() in case stderr is unavailable.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the prelude_error_code_t value corresponding to err .

refsect2.title: prelude_error_make ()
refsect2.para: Create a new prelude_error_t error using source and code .

refsect2.title: prelude_error_make_from_errno ()
refsect2.para: Create a new prelude_error_t error using source and errno .

refsect2.title: prelude_error_verbose_make ()
refsect2.programlisting: prelude_error_t prelude_error_verbose_make (prelude_error_source_t source, prelude_error_code_t code, const char *fmt);
refsect2.para: Create a new error using source and code , using the detailed error message specified within fmt .

refsect2.title: prelude_error_verbose_make_v ()
refsect2.programlisting: prelude_error_t prelude_error_verbose_make_v (prelude_error_source_t source, prelude_error_code_t code, const char *fmt);
refsect2.para: Create a new error using source and code , using the detailed error message specified within fmt .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the errno value corresponding to code .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: PRELUDE_BOOL_TRUE if there is a detailed message for this error, PRELUDE_BOOL_FALSE otherwise.
